sessions.title: Storage Authentication Issue
sessions.summary: Discovered cross-project Firebase auth limitations when uploading to VF OneMap storage from FibreFlow

sessions.title: Routing Best Practices
sessions.summary: Learned that nested lazy routes cause NG04002 errors, should use simple top-level routes

sessions.title: Memory System Implementation
sessions.summary: Implemented local Zep-inspired memory system with Facts, Patterns, Knowledge Graph, and Sessions. Added documentation to CLAUDE.md and created comprehensive guide. Ready for immediate use with future Zep Cloud migration path.
